name: Mazinger Z
overview: Take the role of Koji Kabuto, the pilot of 70's classic anime super-robot Mazinger Z in his quest to save Japan from the mechanical monsters created by evil scientist Doctor Hell. Mazinger Z was designed by Doctor Kabuto (Koji's grandfather) using state-of-the-art technology (Z-Alloy and Photonic Energy) in Japan's national Photonic Research Institute near mount Fuji. These hearquarters along Japan main cities have become the main targets for Dr. Hell's army...
